reference.title: Device Properties
reference.shortdesc: Presents a detailed list of device properties for the chosen connected device or running AVD (if the AVD is not running, this dialog will be empty).

refbody.section: This dialog consists of a scrolling two-column table in which the first column is the property name and the second is the value of that property. To export these properties to a text file in comma-separated-value (CSV) format, click CSV Export and specify the destination.
